thread.title: Week In Politics: U.S. Troops In Afghanistan, Democratic Presidential Debate
thread.title_full: Week In Politics: U.S. Troops In Afghanistan, Democratic Presidential Debate : NPR

author: All Things Considered
title: Week In Politics: U.S. Troops In Afghanistan, Democratic Presidential Debate
text: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with our regular political commentators E.J. Dionne of The Washington Post and Brookings Institution and David Brooks of The New York Times . They discuss President Obama's decision to delay the withdrawal of U.S. troops from Afghanistan and break down the first Democratic presidential debate.
